arrive.title: 2. We Arrive

haul.title: 3. We Haul

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our satisfied customers have to say.

jeffrey.quote: Mario did a fast and efficient job at a very reasonable cost. I had a full load of all types of construction debris. I highly recommend his services!
jeffrey.name: Jeffrey B.

arun.quote: Communicative, fair pricing, efficient. We filled his truck with junk from our storage section of our shop, same day after seeing his truck in the Home Depot parking lot. Very professional.
arun.name: Arun C.

mai.quote: Quick response on the phone within minutes. Nice tracking system to keep customers updated live time where the crew is. Prompt phone call. Punctuate and efficient service. Great price!! Highly recommended.
mai.name: Mai T..

cta.title: Ready to Clear the Clutter?
cta.description: Mario is ready to help with all your hauling needs 24/7. One call does it all!

hero.title: About Mario's Hauling
hero.description: San Francisco Bay Area's trusted hauling partner since 2022, providing professional, reliable, and eco-friendly hauling services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide top-quality hauling and junk removal services while minimizing environmental impact through responsible disposal and recycling practices.

features.satisfaction: Customer satisfaction guaranteed on every job
features.fastResponse: Fast response and same-day service availability
features.licensed: Fully licensed, insured, and professional team

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: We believe in honest, upfront pricing with no hidden fees. Our rates are based on volume, with discounts for larger jobs.

bullet.1: We price based on volume (how much space your items take up in our truck)
bullet.2: Free, no-obligation estimates before we start
bullet.3: Special rates for seniors, veterans, and repeat customers
bullet.4: Minimum charge of $75 for very small jobs

2.title: Medium Load (1/4 truck)
2.desc: Small furniture set, partial garage cleanout

3.title: Large Load (1/2 truck)
3.desc: Full room of furniture, complete garage cleanout

4.title: Full Truck Load
4.desc: Complete home cleanout, large construction debris

pricing.footNote: Prices may vary based on items, location, and accessibility. Call for an exact quote.

whyChooseUs.title: What Sets Us Apart
whyChooseUs.description: With years of experience and a dedication to excellence, we've built our reputation on reliability, quality service, and customer satisfaction.

fast.title: Fast & Reliable
fast.description: Same-day service available with prompt arrival and efficient completion of all hauling jobs, no matter the size.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly
eco.description: Committed to sustainable disposal practices, recycling, and minimizing environmental impact with every job.

professional.title: Professional Team
professional.description: Our experienced team is fully licensed, insured, and trained to handle all types of hauling jobs safely and professionally.

history.title: Company History
history.description: From our humble beginnings to becoming the Bay Area's trusted hauling service, our journey has been built on quality and commitment.

founded.title: Company Founded
founded.description: Mario's Hauling was established to provide reliable junk removal services to the Bay Area.

expanded.title: Expanded Services
expanded.description: Added construction debris removal and green waste disposal to our service offerings.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly Focus
ecoFriendly.description: Implemented sustainable disposal practices, recycling over 60% of collected materials.

bayArea.title: Bay Area Expansion
bayArea.description: Expanded operations to serve the entire Bay Area with 24/7 availability.

serviceAreas.title: Service Areas
serviceAreas.description: We proudly serve the entire San Francisco Bay Area, providing prompt and reliable hauling services to both residential and commercial customers.

areas.surrounding: And all surrounding Bay Area communities

team.title: The Man Behind Mario's Hauling
team.description: Meet the most dedicated man from the team of professionals committed to providing you with exceptional hauling services.

cta.title: Ready to Clear the Clutter?
cta.description: Contact Mario's Hauling today for fast, reliable, and eco-friendly hauling services.

Footer.compDesc: Professional hauling services available 24/7. No job too big or small.
